text: Besaka jinham lokam ne inakara kita ate uha lokam nu alaha de raha ate masajida-e-harama tom rokade hana, jisanu asim lokam la'i bana'i'a hai, jisa vica sathanaka vasi ate baharom a'una vale baî€¼rabaî€¼ra hana. Jihare isa masajida vica bhale raha tom hatake ati'acara da raha apana'ega, usa nu asim daradanaka saza da savada cakhavange
